@Jenna Tolls I mean i have a recidive heavy Depressive Disorder and honestly depending on how strong the Episode is Sex actually helps, but might also make it worse. || With a minor Episode physical contact to my e.g. Girlfriend helps a lot, which Sex falls under. Sex also has the positive Side effect of making me somewhat Tired, but calm. || With a Medium Episode my Libido starts to get suppressed more or less, so while Physical Contact and affirmations still Work great, in most cases i'd prefer non-Sexual warm cuddling, positive affirmations, maybe combined with some Meds and Warm Cocoa to calm me over Sex. || In case of Heavy Episodes i have to agree though, my Libido gets completely Shut off and i become Suicidal and just find a way to hate and blame myself for anything even remotely bad happening, combined with Panic Attacks and all that Shit. || Even if i'd be able to get a up in both ways, wanting and having Sex then is probably one of the worst things someone could do to me.

I thought the plot was quite unique. Since the average hentai doesn't even have a plot, I was happy to get anything.

So I think what happened is that the Big Sister fell in love with her little brother in middle school, but unlike hentai sisters with a bro complex who usually just rape their brothers (or on the off chance, confess and have consensual sex), this sister was a bit more of a realist. She realized how taboo this entire thing was, and thought that she would never have her brother. This is what made her depressed, and as the days went by, it kept getting worse and worse until she was dreaming about killing herself to end her suffering from impossible forbidden love.

Then the hentai logic finally kicked in, and little bro decided to do rash things to keep his big sis alive. He probably didn't see his sister that way, but he was determined to 'put in effort' to keep her alive. Im going to assume he eventually falls in love with her as well, and we have a happy ending.

For someone who dislikes incest because I find that shit disgusting at times, my opinion changes from time to time depending on the situation so it’s gonna be neutral. The plot and story are simple but decent, the sex scenes is slowly warming up, however this hentai manga’s best quality is the Mc and fmc’s bonding with each other was the reason why I find this tolerable. No tsundere, no bs teasing, no netorare bs, this one is really decent in my opinion although it wasn’t my first incest hentai I read but one of my favorites I’ll I have to admit. Other than that this artist has my like so keep up the good work.
